id1.name: Stuffed Shells
id1.author: jsvcycling
id1.instruct_text0: In a frying pan cook ground beef; add taco seasoning and prepare according to package directions.
id1.instruct_text1: Add cream cheese, cover and simmer until cheese is melted. blend well. set aside and cool completely.
id1.instruct_text2: While ground beef is cooking, cook the pasta shells according to directions; drain. set shells out individually on cutting board/baking sheet so that they don't stick together.
id1.instruct_text3: Pour salsa on bottom of 9x13 baking dish.
id1.instruct_text4: Stuff each shell with the meat mixture. place shells in 9x13 pan open side up. cover shells with taco sauce.
id1.instruct_text5: Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees.
id1.instruct_text6: After 30 minutes, add shredded cheese and bake for 10-15 more minutes.
id1.instruct_text7: Add any condiments you'd like (onions, black olives, etc.) serve with sour cream and/or more salsa. enjoy!
